review: I had a serious lower back pain and siatica for more than one year before I met Dr A R Kesavan. Before that I have consulted several doctors including Apollo, where one famous surgen advised me surgery. He prescribed me some medicines including multi minerals tablet, use of medical belt and one week full rest. After a week I was feeling better and started short walking. Slowly I started getting better and restarted my exercisers and stopped the use of belt in 15 days. Now I am perfectly normal.

I had back pain so went to hospital. Treatment was good by doctor. He gave me clear explanation. I am satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor and it helped. X-ray was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. I am recovered now. Physiotherapy was suggested. Doctor was friendly.

I went for doctor consultation as I had a fracture in hand. I also met recently Dr. Dinesh and long back Dr. Kesavan for fracture in hand. *** ******* ** **** **** ** ********** There was not much waiting time. He explained whatever doubts. I am satisfied with doctor and treatment. No medicines was prescribed . He told to x-ray. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends

My brother had met with accident so went to hospital. ****** *** **** ** ********** *** *** **** ***** ********. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Surgery was done for him. There was no waiting time in the hospital.
I had been to hospital and it was for health issue. ********* *** **** ** ******. He was caring, explained well. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.Â
